text: Tara pichata yetiya sihamte sihamtara iddatara sesa simata upanita haâ€™ba, tetiya tomaloke sihamtaka yathabidhi raakhi diba nahaâ€™le sihamtaka yathabidhi paraityaga karaiba arau tomalokara majara paraa dujana n'yayaparaayana lokaka saksi raakhiba; arau tomaloke allahara babe sathikabharae saksya diba. Iyara dbaraa tomalokara majata yiye allaha arau sesa dirasara prati imana raakhe taka upadesa diya haiche; arau yiye allahara takbaraa aralambana karaiba allahe tara babe uttaranara patha uliya'i diba
